Title says most of it. Rawr 4.3.8.0 insists on reforging my gear to 8.5% hit chance when the yellow cap is at 8%. Comparing Rawr's suggested reforge and Ask Mr. Robot's reforge, Rawr believes it has a 4.17% increase over Rawr's suggestions. 

I guess the real question here is if Rawr is putting extra in hit for the spell hit? If that actually is more beneficial than reforging to haste or something.

(Edit: Got Rawr and Robot backwards in the screenshot.)

You'll see a bit of extended help from hit both because of HB being a cornerstone as well as for DW benefits beyond just the initial 8%.  Unfortunately, I can't see your screen shot.  This should probably be turned into an Issue that I can look into.

Keep in mind that most of the team is starting to focus on MoP rather than fix Cata issues.  So I'll take a look, but don't think there's too much to tweak here.
